text: 2:4 2 Samuel 7:12-13; 7:25; 2 Atriviba 20:3Ikiavɨra Itir God fomɨra akar dɨkɨrɨzir mamɨn na gamigha ghaze, ‘Devit, nɨn ovavir boriba zurara uan navir averiaba ko duabar, bar deravɨra nan damazimɨn daru mangɨtɨ, kɨ zurara nɨn adarazir gumazitam damightɨ, a Israelian atrivimɨn otivam.’ Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Solomon, nɨ guizbangɨra bar deraghvɨra an akabar gɨn mangɨ, eghtɨ a na gamizir akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam abighan kogham.
